Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 17 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Arshdeep Singh said he made minor changes to bring in variations
Suryakumar Yadav said the team tried to back their skills and show character
Najmul Hossain Shanto said Bangladesh didn't start well and struggled with strike rotation
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Shrimant Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium, Gwalior
The 2nd T20I will be played on 9th October, Wednesday in New Delhi at the iconic Arun Jaitley Stadium
Varun Chakravarthy said he felt like a rebirth to be back in the blues after 3 long years
